values.name: Night
values.description: What night the player is currently on.

values.name: Extras Unlocked
values.description: Whether or not Extras is unlocked.

values.name: Have Book
values.description: Whether or not the player has the book.

values.name: Show Cutscene
values.description: Whether or not the player should see the Octagon cutscene.

values.name: Died from Conveyor
values.description: Whether or not the player should go to the conveyor belt.

values.name: Story 4
values.description: Whether or not the player should go to the 4th story minigame.

values.name: Door 1 Open
values.description: Whether or not the first door in the octagon is open.

values.name: Door 2 Open
values.description: Whether or not the second door in the octagon is open. (Doesn't work on Night 1)

values.name: Door 3 Open
values.description: Whether or not the third door in the octagon is open. (Doesn't work on Night 1)

values.name: Show Tweetie/Maxie Tip
values.description: Whether or not the player should see the tip in the Tweetie and Maxie games.

values.name: Ladies' Night
values.description: Whether or not the player has beaten the 'Ladies' Night' mode.

values.name: Boys get drunk
values.description: Whether or not the player has beaten the 'Boys get drunk' mode.

values.name: Eyes from the sky
values.description: Whether or not the player has beaten the 'Eyes from the sky' mode.

values.name: Madagascar
values.description: Whether or not the player has beaten the 'Madagascar' mode.

values.name: Cat lover
values.description: Whether or not the player has beaten the 'Cat lover' mode.

values.name: If you like chicken nuggets
values.description: Whether or not the player has beaten the 'If you like chicken nuggets' mode.

values.name: Veterans
values.description: Whether or not the player has beaten the 'Veterans' mode.

values.name: Blaze
values.description: Whether or not the player has beaten the 'Blaze' mode.

values.name: Goes boom
values.description: Whether or not the player has beaten the 'Goes boom' mode.

values.name: Jolly jever
values.description: Whether or not the player has beaten the 'Jolly jever' mode.

values.name: Yellow bear
values.description: Whether or not the player has beaten the 'Yellow bear' mode.
